name: Armored Suit Solgante
storyline:
After years of war, the world nations are finally at peace, having joined together to create the International Federation. Not everyone is happy with the new government, however; a terrorist group known as the Free States continues to fight for independence.

Radulta, the strongest military nation in the world, is tasked with hunting down the remnants of the Free States. As Radulta's top armored suit pilot, this mission falls to you... until you're accused of being a double agent for the enemy, that is.

Will you succeed in balancing your duties and your search for the truth? The only ones you can trust are yourself, your mech, and your loving wife, Eleanor. But whoever set you up will surely have their sights trained on her as well, and it could only be a matter of time...

Protect your wife and your country! Fight for justice and defend everything you care for, or you might just lose it all!
summary: Lieutenant Will, an armored suit pilot, works diligently to combat threats to the nation. Unfortunately, in his struggle to fight against terrorists, he's implicated in one of the very schemes he's fighting against.
